72.heading: Wallis, David.
72.title: Killed Cartoons : Casualties from the War on Free Expression
72.author: edited by David Wallis.

contents.title: Indecent exposure : from sex to death
Profiles in no courage : editors playing politics
Fall from race : nothing is black and white
Protection racket : corporate power at work.

notes: "With censored cartoons, many unpublished, by the likes of Garry Trudeau, Doug Marlette, Paul Conrad, Herblock, and Mike Luckovich (all Pulitzer Prize winners or finalists) as well as unearthed editorial illustrations by Norman Rockwell, Edward Sorel, and Anita Kunz, you will find yourself surprised and often shocked by the images themselves, and outraged by the fact that a fearful editor kept you from seeing them"
back cover.

publication info.publisher: Entries consist of a biographical paragraph
